meanings.definition: A board in a computer or other electronic device that holds chips and other electronic components.
meanings.sent1: The backplanes in the computer help connect all the electronic parts together.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to handle the backplanes carefully when installing new chips.
meanings.sent3: Why did the computer feel sick? It had a case of the backplanes!
meanings.sent4: The backplanes are like the highways of the computer, guiding information to its destination.
meanings.sent5: The backplanes are the backbone of the computer, ensuring smooth communication between components.

meanings.definition: The main circuit board in a computer or other electronic device.
meanings.sent1: The backplanes of the device determine its overall performance.
meanings.sent2: When upgrading your computer, consider replacing the backplanes for better speed.
meanings.sent3: Why did the circuit board go to school? To learn how to be a backplanes!
meanings.sent4: The backplanes are like the heart of the computer, pumping data to every part.
meanings.sent5: Without the backplanes, the computer would be like a body without a central nervous system.
